overview: Manuel is a recent widower who is having trouble getting back into his normal work routine. He hires Maddy to take care of his infant son and help around the house. Maddy's committed to her boyfriend, who might just be stringing her along. As Manuel and Maddy open up to each other, their generation gap begins to close.
tagline: This is the babysitter you wish watched your kids!
title: The Babysitter 7
